00027 BOOL AboutDialog::OnInitDialog()
00028 {
00029         CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00030         //CString name = "NewVision Version " + (CString)(Assembly::GetExecutingAssembly()->GetName()->Version->ToString());
00031         CString tmp;
00032         tmp = "Version " + STR(VERSION_MAJOR) + "." + STR(VERSION_MINOR) + "." + STR(VERSION_BUILD) + "." + STR(VERSION_QFE);
00033         this->GetDlgItem(IDC_NEWVISIONVERSION)->SetWindowTextA(tmp);
00034         tmp = "Built on " + VERSION_BUILD_DATE_TIME;
00035         this->GetDlgItem(IDC_NEWVISIONBUILDDATETIME)->SetWindowTextA(tmp);
00036                         
00037         m_HyperLink.SetURL(_T("http://alexleykin.zapto.org"));
00038         m_HyperLink.SetUnderline(FALSE);
00039 //      m_HyperLink.SetLinkCursor(AfxGetApp()->LoadCursor(IDC_HAND));
00040         return TRUE;  
00041 }
